meanings.sent1: The paper had clippable edges that made it easy to attach to the board.
meanings.sent2: The coupons were printed on clippable paper for convenience.
meanings.sent3: I found a clippable solution to keep my notes organized.
meanings.sent4: Her clippable advice helped me improve my writing skills.
meanings.sent5: The clippable tags on the clothes made them stand out in the store.

meanings.definition: Capable of being cut or trimmed.
meanings.sent1: The bushes in the garden were clippable to maintain their shape.
meanings.sent2: The clippable hedges needed regular pruning to look neat.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally used the clippable scissors on my hair, and now it's too short!
meanings.sent4: His clippable wit could sometimes be sharp but always entertaining.
meanings.sent5: The clippable fabric allowed for easy alterations to the dress.

meanings.sent1: The clippable hair tie kept her hair in place during the workout.
meanings.sent2: The clippable leash was perfect for walking the energetic puppy.
meanings.sent3: I bought a clippable bag to easily attach to my backpack.
meanings.sent4: The clippable keychain made it convenient to find my keys in my bag.
meanings.sent5: The clippable feature on the pen holder made it versatile for different uses.
